name: Inexorable (Chromecore)
description:
__________

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 50 game Jam Theme: Delay The Inevitable

__________

Description:

Keep moving and don't stop. All Hell broke loose and now you must delay your inexorable death by maneuvering around and shooting everything that moves. But beware, Hell is prepared to send more and more endless waves of demons at you.

__________

Controls:

WASD or ARROWS - Movement

LEFT MOUSE or SPACE - Shoot

MOUSE - Look

__________

Let me know if you would want to see a fully fleshed out version of this game.
